Issue.creator: ozheregelya
Issue.description: sovrin 1.1.89 -> sovrin 1.1.90 docker pool *Steps to Reproduce:* 1. Setup the pool of 10 nodes with indy-node 1.6.675 and sovrin 1.1.62 (last not pinned version). 2. Send pool upgrade transaction to sovrin 1.1.89 (depending on indy-node 1.6.675). 3. Send pool upgrade transaction to sovrin 1.1.90 (depending on indy-node 1.6.678). *Actual Results:* Upgrade failed due to following error: {code:java} Nov 14 16:49:16 8fcd6b2e84ed env 5196 : The following packages have unmet dependencies: Nov 14 16:49:17 8fcd6b2e84ed env 5196 : sovrin : Depends: indy-node (= 1.6.678) but 1.6.675 is to be installed Nov 14 16:49:17 8fcd6b2e84ed env 5196 : E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages. Nov 14 16:49:17 8fcd6b2e84ed env 5196 : + ret=100 Nov 14 16:49:17 8fcd6b2e84ed env 5196 : + ' ' 100 -ne 0 ' ' Nov 14 16:49:17 8fcd6b2e84ed env 5196 : + echo 'Failed to obtain sovrin=1.1.90' Nov 14 16:49:17 8fcd6b2e84ed env 5196 : Failed to obtain sovrin=1.1.90 Nov 14 16:49:17 8fcd6b2e84ed env 5196 : + exit 1 {code} *Expected Results:* Sovrin should be upgraded. >
